WRITING.TEXT: Thank you! Aha I have a long way to go! My first aim is to 5x5 100kg squat! I'll definitely get there!

The hardest bit was definitely the eating! I knew I needed to eat more to sustain the lifting but it was very hard! I struggle to eat out in public in restaurants at times still but I'll probably have that forever! Thanks for the comment bro, it's much appreciated 3

Thank you! It took me a while to see the progress in the mirror as I got used to the changes over time. I still think I'm the small guy I was sometimes but seeing the plates on the bar certainly helps! Much love man. No homo 3
Aha cheers man! I've got a lot further to go and hopefully I'll be posting more progress over the next year. So much to do! You rock too
